Header.Notes: Regridded on the grid of ERA5-Land, then bias-adjusted with detrended quantile mapping on a day-of-year basis with a window of 31 days, LOESS detrending and 50 quantiles. The reference was ERA5-Land over the 1991-2020 period. The variables tasmax, dtr and pr were adjusted, tasmin was computed from tasmax and dtr after the adjustment.
